title: Enrico Ceccato
text:
Enrico Ceccato (born 24 July 1986) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays as a <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%232.%20Hooker">hooker</a> . As of June 2013 he played for <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton Treviso</a> in the <a href="Pro14">Pro12</a>.
In each of the three seasons to June 2013 Ceccato played for both Treviso and Mogliano, by loaning to the other team for a period of time.
At the international level he competed in the youth world championship in 2005 in South Africa.
